quote_first: Vero smiled. “I t-take that as approval. So let me summarize. On its present trajectory and speed, the Blade of Night will pass behind the moon between 11:13 and 11:22 p.m. Jerusalem time on the night of the seventeenth of February. That’s four days away. It will be sufficiently close that the moon will fully cover the disk of the earth at
title: The Infinite Day
author: Chris Walley

quote_last: . A row of bungalows in a round with a clump of larch tree in the middle.
title: Trumpet
author: Jackie Kay
